name: Constance Ejuma
introduction: Constance Ejuma is the Vice President, SEO and has led the SEO team at PMC for 5 years. Her team trains and consults with editorial leaders from every brand on SEO best practices, supporting the organic growth of PMC sites. Constance joined PMC in 2015.Constance started her career at a boutique agency called Telic Media before moving on to Demand Media, the content publisher largely responsible for inspiring Google to introduce the infamous Panda algorithm.After graduating the University of Toronto, Constance Graduated with Distinction from Leicester University in England with a Master of Art in Mass Communications.
